name: Super Smash Banks
description:
Join the battle on Wall Street! Fight the other team, increase your net worth, and get out with your gains!

(Single player action game. Built with a team of four in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021. See the official GGJ page for this game here. Includes links to the other team members.)

How to play

  • Pick a team with the A or D keys.
  • Move with WASD.
  • Attack the other team with the M key (M for Melee).
  • Successful attacks stun the affected battlers and make them drop money in the form of shares of Stock. Touch the stock to pick it up and acquire the shares for yourself.
  • Press the G key to Get Out with your gains/losses. (Does not work when stunned.) Try to do this before you go bankrupt!
  • Press the P key at any point to reset the game and Play Again.
